Text:
thanks so much for putting these up, the ones i got yesterday all worked great. Just one thing please seed them once people get 100% they can help seed and than all will be able to get them and help you to seed them back. the general hospital from yesterday I am stuck at 75% can yo seed it please. and also seed these you just put up. 
other than that your doing great and I cant thank you enough for doing this the wife is thrilled to be able to see them
Thanks, I will continue to seed these files soon. I am currently using my internet connection to rip the latest episodes and had to shut down the seeding temporarily.
